verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him by the <S%H436>oaks<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>, as he <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>;

and he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H7969>and<s%>, lo, three <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> over against <S%H7200>him<s%>: and when he saw <S%H7323>them<s%>, he ran to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them from the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself to the <S%H776>earth<s%>,
and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H136>lord<s%>, if now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, pass not <S%H5674>away<s%>, I pray <S%H5650>thee<s%>, from thy servant:
let now a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> be <S%H3947>fetched<s%>, and <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H4994>your<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and rest <S%H8172>yourselves<s%> under the <S%H6086>tree<s%>:

and I will <S%H3947>fetch<s%> a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and strengthen ye <S%H5582>your<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; after <S%H310>that<s%> ye shall pass <S%H5674>on<s%>: forasmuch as ye are <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%>. And they <S%H1696>said<s%>, So <S%H6213>do<s%>, as thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4116>hastened<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> unto <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Make ready <S%H4116>quickly<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H7058>meal<s%>, <S%H3888>knead<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> unto the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> a <S%H1121>calf<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto the <S%H5288>servant<s%>; and he <S%H4116>hasted<s%> to dress <S%H6213>it<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2529>butter<s%>, and <S%H2461>milk<s%>, and the <S%H1121>calf<s%> which he had <S%H6213>dressed<s%>, and <S%H5414>set<s%> it before <S%H6440>them<s%>; and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> by them under the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and they did <S%H398>eat<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H346>him<s%>, Where is <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> thy <S%H802>wife<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H168>Behold<s%>, in the tent.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H7725>certainly<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> unto thee when the <S%H6256>season<s%> cometh <S%H2416>round<s%>; <S%H8283>and<s%>, lo, Sarah thy <S%H802>wife<s%> shall have a <S%H1121>son<s%>. And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>, which was behind <S%H310>him<s%>.

Now <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> were <S%H2205>old<s%>, and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age<s%>; it had <S%H2308>ceased<s%> to be with <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> after the <S%H734>manner<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%>.

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H6711>laughed<s%> within <S%H7130>herself<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H310>After<s%> I am waxed <S%H1086>old<s%> shall I have <S%H5730>pleasure<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%> being old <S%H2204>also<s%>?

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> did <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H6711>laugh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Shall I of a <S%H552>surety<s%> <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H589>child<s%>, who am <S%H2204>old<s%>?

Is <S%H6381><s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? At the <S%H4150>set<s%> time I will <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H6256>thee<s%>, when the season cometh <S%H2416>round<s%>, and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall have a <S%H1121>son<s%>.

Then <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H3584>denied<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I <S%H6711>laughed<s%> <S%H3372>not<s%>; for she was afraid. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3808>Nay<s%>; but thou didst <S%H6711>laugh<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H8259>thence<s%>, and looked <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>: and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with them to bring them on the <S%H7971>way<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Shall I <S%H3680>hide<s%> from <S%H85>Abraham<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>do<s%>;

seeing that <S%H85>Abraham<s%> shall surely become a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be blessed in <S%H1288>him<s%>?

For I have <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H834>him<s%>, to the end that he may <S%H6680>command<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> and his <S%H1004>household<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%>, that they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%>; to the end that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> upon <S%H85>Abraham<s%> that which he hath spoken of <S%H1696>him<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Because the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>, and because their <S%H2403>sin<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>grievous<s%>;

I will go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7200>now<s%>, and see whether they have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3617>altogether<s%> according to the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of <S%H935>it<s%>, which is come unto <S%H3045>me<s%>; and if not, I will know.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> from <S%H3212>thence<s%>, and went toward <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>: but <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Wilt thou <S%H5595>consume<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>?

Peradventure there <S%H3426>are<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>: wilt thou <S%H5595>consume<s%> and not <S%H5375>spare<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4616>for<s%> the <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> that are <S%H7130>therein<s%>?

That be <S%H2486>far<s%> from thee to <S%H6213>do<s%> after this <S%H1697>manner<s%>, to <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, that so the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> should be as the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; that be <S%H2486>far<s%> from <S%H8199>thee<s%>: shall not the Judge of all the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>right<s%>?

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, If I <S%H4672>find<s%> in <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>, then I will <S%H5375>spare<s%> all the place for their <S%H4725>sake<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold <S%H2974>now<s%>, I have taken upon me to <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H595>who<s%> am but <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes<s%>:

peradventure there shall <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> of the <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: wilt thou <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all the <S%H5892>city<s%> for lack of <S%H2568>five<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H4672>it<s%>, if I find there <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%>.

And he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him yet <S%H3254>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Peradventure there shall be <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H559>there<s%>. And he said, I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> it for the <S%H705>forty<s%>'s sake.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4994>Oh<s%> let not the <S%H136>Lord<s%> be <S%H2734>angry<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>: peradventure there shall <S%H7970>thirty<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H559>there<s%>. And he said, I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4672>it<s%>, if I find thirty <S%H7970>there<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold <S%H2974>now<s%>, I have taken upon me to <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%>: peradventure there shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H559>there<s%>. And he said, I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it for the <S%H6242>twenty<s%>'s sake.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Oh let not the <S%H136>Lord<s%> be <S%H2734>angry<s%>, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H389>yet<s%> but this <S%H6471>once<s%>: peradventure <S%H6235>ten<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H559>there<s%>. And he said, I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it for the <S%H6235>ten<s%>'s sake.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> went his <S%H3212>way<s%>, as soon <S%H834>as<s%> he had <S%H3615>left<s%> off <S%H1696>communing<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%>: and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>.
